title: 求一个可以重启插件的插件
author: azarticle
txt_content: Cauldron服务端不能用/reload这个指令，装插件和改文档的时候都很麻烦，哪位大神能给个可以不关闭服务器重启插件的插件。

replies.author: dd20001115
replies.txt_content: 你可以在服务器插件版上找到重启插件，有你需要的资源。

replies.author: HJ_KISS
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D

http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D

http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D

replies.author: Y酱酱酱酱
replies.txt_content: 啊？插件一般都自带一个重启的指令的一般都是指令前缀 空格加reload例如：.swr reload

replies.author: 61叔叔
replies.txt_content: Auto Shutdown / Restart  去服务端插件找
